generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Red+Hat+Display:wght@400;500;700;900&display=swap");*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}.nav{padding-top:48px}.nav .hero__img__image,.nav .nav__logo{display:block;margin:auto}.nav .hero__img__image{width:100%}.hero{margin-top:55px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-template-rows:auto;grid-template-areas:"image1 image2" "content content"}.hero .hero__img1{grid-area:image1}.hero .hero__img2{grid-area:image2}.hero .hero__img__image{display:block;width:100%}.hero .hero__content{grid-area:content;max-width:457px;margin:45px auto 0}.hero .hero__content__title{font-size:2.5rem;text-transform:capitalize;line-height:44px;text-align:center;color:#28283d;font-weight:900;padding:10px 50px 18px}.hero .hero__content__summary{font-size:1rem;text-align:center;line-height:26px;padding:0 20px}.hero .hero__content__btns{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center;gap:20px;margin-top:38px}.hero .hero__content__btns--btn{font-size:1rem;font-weight:900;line-height:26px;color:#fff;background-color:#4d96a9;border:2px solid transparent;padding:14px 36px;border-radius:29px;display:block}.hero .btn__span{color:#8fe3f9}.hero .secondary--btn{background-color:#855fb1}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.hero{margin-top:65px}.hero .hero__content__btns{flex-direction:row}.hero .hero__content__title{padding:24px 50px 18px;margin-bottom:15px}}@media screen and (min-width:1080px){.hero{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-template-areas:"image1 content image2"}}.main{padding:24px;z-index:2;position:relative}.main .main__container{margin-top:65px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;gap:20px}.main .main__container__img__image{width:100%;border-radius:8px}.main .main__span{width:56px;height:56px;border:1px solid #87879d;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;border-radius:50%;font-size:1rem;font-weight:900;margin:auto;position:relative}.main .main__span:before{content:"";width:1px;height:84px;background-color:#87879d;position:absolute;top:-85px;left:50%}.main .span__one{position:relative;margin-top:120px}.main .main__description{margin-top:50px}.main .main__description__title{text-align:center;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:26px;letter-spacing:4px;font-size:1rem;font-weight:900;color:#4d96a9}.main .main__description__subtitle{line-height:36px;font-size:2rem;font-weight:900;text-align:center;color:#28283d;margin-top:28px}.main .main__description__summary{text-align:center;line-height:26px;margin-top:32px;padding:7px}.main .span__two{margin-top:130px;background:#fff}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.main{padding:24px 39px}.main .main__container{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr}.main .span__one{margin-top:138px}.main .main__description{max-width:573px;margin:50px auto 0}.main .main__description__subtitle{line-height:44px;font-size:2.5rem;padding:0 60px}}.footer{width:100%;background:url(/d2e1cf14e41ab654089115e3b654a21e.jpg);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover;position:relative;z-index:0}.footer .footer__container{margin-top:-52px;background-color:#4d96ad;opacity:.9;height:100%;padding-bottom:50px}.footer .footer__title{font-size:2rem;text-align:center;color:#fff;padding-top:96px;line-height:36px;font-weight:900}.footer .footer__summary{text-align:center;color:#fff;font-size:1.125rem;line-height:26px;margin-top:20px;padding:0 24px}.footer .hero__content__btns--btn{font-size:1rem;font-weight:900;line-height:26px;color:#fff;background-color:#4d96a9;border:2px solid transparent;padding:14px 36px;border-radius:29px;display:block;margin:32px auto;background-color:#855fb1}.footer .btn__span{color:#d9b8ff}@media screen and (min-width:680px){.footer{background:url(/d1be0cacf5e439d6a1389ce76704c723.jpg)}}@media screen and (min-width:1280px){.footer{background:url(/5b81381484344ac40f9ee0137b36653d.jpg)}}body{background-color:#fff;color:#87879d;font-family:Red Hat Display,sans-serif}
